title: really sloppy but eligible handwriting
content:
hi, there, I just found this community and am drooling all over right now over the wealth of info.

Question: I am making a promo card for "Minute Taking Made Easy" workshop and am looking for a really sloppy handwriting font, that at the same time is extremely legible (to use as a headline). Looking for ink blotches, crossed over letters, scrathes etc. The postcard will also have a picture of a frustrated secretary on it.

Thanks a lot!

Natalia.
author: unata

comments.content: check [Houseind](http://web.archive.org/web/20130420044812/http:/houseind.com/), they have lots of font packages.

Tim
